page.title: 16A MIDDLETON SCHOOLBOY'S DAY
page.content: I wake up at 7:15 to watch telly. George calls for me at 8:15. We get to school at 8:30 and play football until 9:00. In school we go down to the hall to sing hymns. After hymn practice we go to class and do our random number square. Ding, there's the bell. I'll play soccer. Ding, now it's time for maths, last page of graphs is nearly done. Ding, it's dinner time I wonder what's for dinner? Yuck! Mashed potatoes. It's 12:30 and I've just finished my dinner. Outside it's 3-0 for us. Ding, I'll go up to class to get my mark then I'll read a book until the bell rings. Ding, games after break. I'm playing football again. Ding, it's games now, I hope it's high jump, I can jump 1.20 Metres but I'll watch for today. Ding, there's the bell. At home I watch T.V. and then go to bed.
